vulnerability.name: USN-4487-2
vulnerability.description: USN-4487-1 fixed several vulnerabilities in libx11. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM and 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   Todd Carson discovered that libx11 incorrectly handled certain memory  operations. A local attacker could possibly use this issue to escalate  privileges. (CVE-2020-14344)   Jayden Rivers discovered that libx11 incorrectly handled locales. A local  attacker could possibly use this issue to escalate privileges.  (CVE-2020-14363)

statements.status_notes: Several security issues were fixed in libx11. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
